topic.title: Searching and Refactoring Operations in SQF

section.title: Search Actions
section.p: The following search actions can be applied on quick fix ids and are available from the Search submenu in the contextual menu of the current editor or from the Document References menu:

section.title: Refactoring Actions
section.p: The following refactoring actions can be applied on quick fix ids and are available from the Refactoring submenu in the contextual menu of the current editor or from the Document Refactoring menu:
